desc: Be the first in 40+ years to own a brand new Power Hitter! The ultimate way to smoke. Smoke anywhere-even in the wind. Just roll up a smoke, insert it into the holder, screw on the cap, squeeze the bottle, and enjoy a Power Hit. Pre-order Limited Editions Now!

layout.text: SOME THINGS SHOULD NEVER CHANGE-UNLESS THEY GET BETTER

Since the ‘70’s, the PowerHitter has been the quickest and easiest way to extract the maximum potential from a joint.  We’ve taken this classic design and updated it with modern materials to create the next generation of the ultimate joint smoking device.
BE THE FIRST TO GET ONE
